pkgmetadata.longdescription: # ST common data## Introduction`st_common_data` is common data that is used in different ST projects.## Installation```shellpip install st_common_data```## Usage```pythonfrom st_common_data.nyse_holidays import NYSE_HOLIDAYSfrom st_common_data.utils.common import ( is_holiday, get_current_eastern_datetime, round_half_up_decimal, # .... )```## To update pip package via terminal:1) Add updates2) Change version in st_common_data.\__init\__.py3) Commit changes4) Run build:```python3 -m buildpython3 -m pip install --upgrade twine```5) Run this command from the same directory where dist directory is located:```twine upload --skip-existing dist/*```
